A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The old hope died after the force awakened.

Simply put\, what an epically tragic waste of potential. 

Only the great George R R Martin could deliberately leave his fans so completely disappointed. However\, when he does it we're still left an abundance of possibilities and new characters worth investing our emotions in. 

We can only imagine what the conversations were like at the writers table. "Oh no\, the fans have guessed all the best twists and turns!" Says Writer One. "Well\, we'll just make it so every character is irrelevant and has no compelling back story!" Says Writer Two. "They'll love it!" (Maniacal laugh) 

Poorly written\, ineffective and out of place humor\, wasted character potential\, more plot holes than Chicago pot holes\, constant logic fallacies\, and just an underwhelming\, boring segway between a movie that gave us hope and the movie we lost all hope for.
